entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING, Kluane Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:59 p.m. MST Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this evening. Amount 10 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow ending before morning then partly cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 5 in the evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 17 April 2023
